name: capmcAPIxnameOffPOSToffComputeNode - Verify xname_off keeps power off for a compute node that is already powered off
fullName: api.2-disruptive.test_xname_off.tavern#capmcAPIxnameOffPOSToffComputeNode - Verify xname_off keeps power off for a compute node that is already powered off

steps.name: Stage 0: capmcAPIxnameOffPOSToffComputeNodeTarget - Retrieve a compute node from HSM to be used in later stages
Stage 1: capmcAPIxnameOffPOSToffComputeNodePrep - Power the target node off to prepare it for the test case
Stage 2: capmcAPIxnameOffPOSToffComputeNodeStatusCheck - Verify that the target node is powered off using get_xname_status
Stage 3: capmcAPIxnameOffPOSToffComputeNodeActual - Power the target node off using xname_off
Stage 4: capmcAPIxnameOffPOSToffComputeNodeStatusCheck - Verify that the target node remained powered off using get_xname_status
